backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark tech theme with custom color variables, fonts, and utility classes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry configuring PWA metadata, manifest, icons, fonts, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, start URL, theme, and icons including maskable variants.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for app shell and offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple wrapper rendering CalculatorPage as the app’s main view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Dark, tech‑styled theme with OKLCH colors, custom fonts, and grid utilities for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/calculations.ts: Pure functions computing strikes, panic price, round numbers, and trade management values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounts the React app.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorPage.tsx: React page that manages calculator inputs, computes option-related results using helper functions, and displays a trading signal based on premiums.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing goals for an Android-installable PWA calculator app, required assets, features, and pending requests.
